content.raw: It's confirmed that the `gazebo-ros-pkgs` version in ROS stable is 2.15.14 and we need to install 2.15.17. I tested compiling the package from source and installing it from the shadow-fixed repository and it works. We need to put on hold this pull request until the next sync or convert the visual plugin to a model plugin. I suggest to wait, as this plugin is being under development in any case.
